titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an Rowland Hutt, [Sommer 1946 ?]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der ÖNB (Autogr. 1280/33-8); Kopie im BA.

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: [...] luck. ‒ Drury is back in England & demoted. He is looking around for a doctor who wants an assistant. He'll be in London for a few weeks after Oct 17th. (His address is: 3 Colleton Crescent Exeter)
Thanks again! I shall send you some more detective stories before long.
P.S. I leave the next page free as a space for notes.
